alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY, WEST CENTRAL CHAMPAIGN AND MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Pleasant Hill, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Tipp City, West Milton, Covington, St. Paris, Pleasant Hill, Union, Christiansburg, Laura, Fletcher, Casstown, Ludlow Falls, Lockington, Newbern, Carysville, Ballou, Plattsville and Kiser Lake State Park. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 68 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
